freeflow data variables
[freeflow variables]


Modules

group  collections of freeflow variables

Variables

lcm_simple * surfit::flow_lcm_simple = NULL
 law of conservation of mass for homogeneous formation (constants for formation permeability, thick and liquid viscosity) and stationary filtration.
parea * surfit::flow_parea = NULL
 area with a "production" constant value, distributed on the area
pcntr * surfit::flow_pcntr = NULL
 line with "production" values (pcntr)
piso * surfit::flow_piso = NULL
 line with "production" values (piso)
ptask * surfit::flow_ptask = NULL
 scattered data points (ptask) with "production" values

Variable Documentation

FLOW_EXPORT ptask * surfit::flow_ptask = NULL
 

This class describes the set of scattered data points for surface reconstruction. Each point describes by three coordinates , where is fluid rate/injectivity for point.

By loading ptask object to memory we modify flow_lcm_simple functional by adding functional:

So, we get flow_lcm_simple functional for this cell:

Differentiation of this expression by leads to law of conservation of mass with external source of run-off written for the cell (i,j).

Example :
  • map_ptask::tcl
